name: Fight Me (Zeppelin Games)
description:
This is a game for Twitch streamers! 
Get your viewers to play a game of strategy against you.

Last man standing on the board wins!

How it works:
-Setup the game under the setup option in game (do this before streaming)
-Get your viewers to join by typing !join
-Once they are in set your piece where you want to start using !setspawn ?? 
where the question marks are the coordinates you want your piece
-When its your turn use !up, !down, !left, !right to move your player. 

Remember, strategy is key.

Currently only works with Twitch. 
Get your auth token here: https://twitchapps.com/tmi/
